metadata.title: CVE-2016-9920 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: steps/mail/sendmail.inc in Roundcube before 1.1.7 and 1.2.x before 1.2.3,when no SMTP server is configured and the sendmail program is enabled, doesnot properly restrict the use of custom envelope-from addresses on thesendmail command line, which allows remote authenticated users to executearbitrary code via a modified HTTP request that sends a crafted e-mailmessage.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
